price: 45. Ee iskaga tag intay la kulmaan Maalinkooda ay la suuxi (qarracan).
arabic: فَذَرۡهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ يُلَٰقُواْ يَوۡمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِي فِيهِ يُصۡعَقُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fadharhum ḥattā yulāqū yawmahumu alladhī fīhi yuṣ'ʿaqūna
